title: La chanteuse des îles (The Island Singer)
itunes:title: La chanteuse des îles (The Island Singer)
description:
An R&B-loving teenager from the tiny island of Mayotte sees her world turned upside down when her mother signs her up for an amateur opera competition.

A transcript of this episode is available at https://bit.ly/3H9YyED.
